title: Fallout 3 cheats.rar
description:
A collection of popular cheats for FALLOUT 3, gathered from many sources,
with a few found by myself.

You can bring up the console by pressing tilde ~ or on UK keyboards the ` key to the left of the number 1 key (above TAB)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
General Notes
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

To overcome problems with graphics shaders, uninstall ffdshow codecs or set ffdshow to ignore the game

if you are using K-Lite codecs or a similar package, uninstalling then re-installing, setup will allow you to chose which games to ignore.

to overcome probs on slower Pc&#039;s, set the game options to low and on the advanced tab, set actor fade to maximum (15)
this will allow you to see them in open ground without them sneaking up on you.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
ITEM DUPLICATION
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Do you need a couple of items but only have one ?

put your item into any container (or corpse) and bring up the console window.
click on the container (its name will appear at the top of the screen).
type inv and hit enter.
the contents of the container will be displayed along with an 8 digit code. 
(some items also display 2 other numbers, the items value and its health.)
type additem (8 digit code) (quantity wanted) hit enter.
close the console again and look in the container (or corpse) to get the goodies.
or
type player.additem (8 digit code) (quantity wanted) hit enter to put the goodies in your own inventory.

you can use the inv command to see what an npc is carrying
or add stuff to their inventory with &#039;additem&#039;.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
FOR NPC&#039;s, CONTAINERS ETC...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

inv - to see what they have
removeitem (8 digit code) (how many) - deletes the selected item(s) you identified with the INV command 
removeallitems - deletes everything thats lootable - leaves them running round in theur underwear

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
STEALING WITHOUT PICKPOCKETING...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

open the console, click on your victim (they dont need to be near, just in view)
inv (to see what they have)
removeitem (code)(amount) - delete from their inventory
player.additem (code)(amount) - place item(s) in your inventory.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
OPENING LOCKED SAFES, DOORS, CONTAINERS AND COMPUTERS
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

open the console, click on the locked item (check its name is displayed at the top of the screen)
type unlock and hit enter - some objects need to be clicked near the top of them - IE: top drawer of a filing cabinet
close the console again and whatever was locked is now unlocked.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
POWER ARMOR  - cant be bothered to complete the quest?  (or cant find it?)
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

SetPcCanUsePowerArmor  (you dont need caps, its just to make it easier to read)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
PLAYER STAT ADJUSTMENTS 
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

getXPfornextlevel - show how much XP you need before you level up
advlevel - go up a level without changing current XP

player.setav (skill) (number - max 100)

NOTE : Changes to skills before you leave vault 101 can cause problems when you first level-up.

SKILL =	sneak
	barter
	smallguns
	bigguns
	repair	
	(etc. etc. check your PipBoy 3000 for the full list)

player.setav (attr) (number - max 10)

ATTR =	strength
	perception
	endurance
	charisma
	intelligence
	agility
	luck

player.setav carryweight (number)		how much stuff you can carry  - try 2000

player.setav actionpoints (number)		how many points you have in VATS mode - try 500

tgm	toggle god mode (fire a couple of shots to test it. ON=no ammo used)

tcl	toggle no clipping mode - gets you out of pits and scenery glitches. handy to explore high ledges.

player.addperk (perk code)  or  player.removeperk (perk code)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
QUEST CHEATS
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

tmm 1 - show all locations on the map
movetoqt - move to current quest marker
GetQuestCompleted - complete selected quest (doesnt fill in markers on the map)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
SPAWNING STUFF
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

player.placeatme (object code), (how many), (x axis), (y axis)  -  Note: Use 1 for the value of the x axis and y axis.

000AF836	Deathclaw  (Fun to spawn one in Megaton)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
GUNS n AMMO
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

player.additem (item code) (number wanted)

0000000A - bobby pins for picking locks
0000000F - caps
00004350 - silenced 10mm 		00004241 - 10mm ammo

00004322 - Alien Blaster		00029364 - Blaster ammo

bet you didnt know there was a crashed UFO. follow the the right hand side of the powerlines 
that go north from the VAPN powerstation near the town of MINEFIELD.
